versos: (master) Ephesians 6:9 - "And masters, treat your slaves in the same way. Do not threaten them, since you know that he who is both their master and yours is in heaven, and there is no favoritism with him.";;;
(blessed) "blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God." - Matthew 5:9;;;
(honoured) "For I will honour those who honour me, but those who despise me will be disdained." - 1 Samuel 2:30;;;
(forward) Ezekiel 1:9 - "Their wings touched one another; they turned not when they went; they went every one straight forward.";;;
(treasure) Matthew 6:21 - "For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.";;;
(wrote) Romans 15:4 - For whatever was written in former days was written for our instruction

(masters) Ephesians 6:9 - "And masters, treat your slaves in the same way. Do not threaten them, since you know that he who is both their Master and yours is in heaven, and there is no favoritism with him.";;;
(stranger) "Do not oppress a foreigner; you yourselves know how it feels to be foreigners, because you were foreigners in Egypt." - Exodus 23:9;;;
(sheba) 1 Kings 10:1 - "When the queen of sheba heard about the fame of Solomon and his relationship to the Lord, she came to test Solomon with hard questions.";;;
(dedan) Ezekiel 27:15 - The men of dedan were your traders; many coastlands were your market; they brought you ivory tusks and ebony as payment.;
(thoughts) Psalm 94:19 - "When anxiety was great within me, your consolation brought me joy.";;;
(son) "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life." - John 3:16;;;
(holpen) Psalm 89:19: "Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.";;;
(labours) 1 Thessalonians 1:3 - "Remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;";;;
(persuade) Acts 26:28 - Then Agrippa said to Paul, "Do you think that in such a short time you can persuade me to be a Christian";;;
(alive) Ephesians 2:4 - But because of his great love for us
